meanings.sent1: The sunflower with the bunchiest petals stood out in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The tree with the bunchiest fruits was the most popular among the kids.
meanings.sent3: The bunchiest balloon at the party popped with a loud bang!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was the bunchiest, like a colorful bouquet on her head.
meanings.sent5: The bunchiest bouquet of flowers brightened up the room.

meanings.sent1: The vine was the bunchiest in the entire garden, full of grapes.
meanings.sent2: The bush produced the bunchiest berries we had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The bunchiest cluster of balloons floated gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The clouds gathered in the bunchiest formation, creating a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The bunchiest group of friends always had the most fun together.

meanings.definition: In the manner of a bunch.
meanings.sent1: The flowers were arranged bunchiest in the vase, creating a lovely display.
meanings.sent2: She tied the ribbons bunchiest around the gift box.
meanings.sent3: The kids ran bunchiest through the field, laughing and playing.
meanings.sent4: The dancers moved bunchiest across the stage, perfectly synchronized.
meanings.sent5: The leaves rustled bunchiest in the gentle breeze.
